coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (including Adult Travel Vaccinations: covered in full)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit - SR 2,500.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Kidney Transplant SR 250,000.00; Other Organ Transplant Not Covered
coverage_details.dental_emergency: SR 2,000.00 (Deductible: 0%); Emergency Dental Treatment covered up to SAR 5,625
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,500.00 (Age limit: 0 to 999); Multi-coated, anti-glare, multifocal and advanced lenses covered when medically required (basic lenses: covered for 10 cases only)
coverage_details.screening: Covered - Up to Annual Limit; Health Screening/Checkup covered up to SR 1,500
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & inpatient services, except for outpatient services that have specified limits. No pre-authorisation required except for dental, hearing aids, maternity, optical, and kidney dialysis services which require pre-approval. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Orthodontic Treatment Maximum: Paid in full up to the annual dental maximum. Prosthetic devices and medical equipment: covered in full if medically necessary and approved. Passive War Risk: covered in full. Injuries from attempted suicide, self-inflicted injuries, or natural disasters (e.g., earthquakes, tornados): covered in full. Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT): covered except for unproven/questionable methods. Cosmetic operations related to injury, sickness, or congenital anomaly: covered in full. Well Child West (immunisation for children under 6, covered up to age 18): covered in full. Alternative therapies (acupuncture, chiropody, chiropractor, osteopathy, homeopathy): covered in full. Home nursing charges: covered in full. Allergy test and treatment: covered if related to medicines, diagnosis, and treatment. Advanced diabetic devices and sensors: covered for 25 members. Implanting an artificial joint (knee, shoulder, pelvis): covered.
